/>
Introduction
This topic contains special procedures applicable to aggravation determinations under 38 CFR 3.306, including
records needed to determine baseline level of disability
evaluating disabilities service-connected (SC) by aggravation under 38 U.S.C. 1153
, and
aggravation with a zero percent evaluation
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section C - In-Service Aggravation of a Pre-Service Disability
citation: Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section C
